sub_topic: Determining the type of bond between two atoms
message_1: What type of bond is formed between a nitrogen atom and an oxygen atom in a molecule of nitrogen monoxide (NO)?
message_2: In a molecule of nitrogen monoxide (NO), a covalent bond is formed between the nitrogen atom and the oxygen atom. Specifically, it is a polar covalent bond due to the difference in electronegativity between nitrogen and oxygen atoms.
